entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: The White House declined to explain why President Trump hasn’t completed an annual physical yet, despite questions this week over his use of a potentially dangerous drug after being exposed to an aide with coronavirus. Latest with @GeoffRBennett https://t.co/lUDyc2N2RE
